results.content: Good course, not for the complete beginner. Helps to have some understanding of Django, python, databases, and javascript up front.
results.content_html: Good course, not for the complete beginner. Helps to have some understanding of Django, python, databases, and javascript up front.

results.content:
Great course, very detailed explanation of how and what to do. Exactly what I looked for.
Just one additional question - it will be good to upload all project at github, or add for each video source code which not typed but copied from another files.
